articles.author: Patrick Reilly
articles.title: Two US veterans released by Russian separatists land in NYC - New York Post
articles.description: Two US veterans who were released by Russian separatists as part of a prisoner exchange are finally back on American soil after landing in New York City on Friday.
articles.content:
Two US veterans who were released by Russian separatists as part of a prisoner exchange are finally back on American soil after landing in New York City on Friday.
